name: Corruption Cradle
content:
Corruption Cradle

A twisted landscape where corruption has taken root and spread its influence. Primary Objectives are corruption nodes. Secondary markers are essence wells or corrupted monuments. The very air seems to pulse with malevolent energy.


Terrain Features:

  • Corruption nodes
  • Essence wells
  • Corrupted monuments
  • Twisted vegetation

Atmosphere:

The air is thick with the stench of corruption and decay. Strange lights flicker in the mist, and the ground itself seems to writhe with malevolent energy. The whispers of corrupted spirits echo through the twisted landscape.
